text: The 2017 French Athletics Championships was the 129th edition of the national championship in outdoor track and field for France. It was held on 14–16 July at the Pierre-Delort Stadium in Marseille. A total of 38 events (divided evenly between the sexes) were contested over the three-day competition. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |100 metres (wind: -1.4 m/s) |Christophe Lemaitre|| 10.34 |Ben
